name: Frog Champ
description:
A simple game where you are a simple frog, hopping along trying not to bump into things.

For this game, I decided to do all my own artwork and stay within a confined color palette and resolution as a sort of personal limitation - I chose to work in the style of the original Gameboy for this one, and I'm in love with the aesthetic :)

A/D: Move left/right
W/Space: Jump

Made in about 8 hours for Mini Jam 79: Frogs
